mainpage.subtitle: Maybe there's a lot of
mainpage.text: Transform the way you organize your life.
mainpage.whyDesc: Discover the features that make WorkToDo the perfect tool to maximize your productivity and organize your life smartly.

feature1.title: Smart Organization
feature1.desc: Intuitive management system that adapts to your workflow. Organize complex projects with elegant simplicity.

feature2.title: Instant Sync
feature2.desc: Real-time access from any device. Your data always up to date, wherever you are.

feature3.title: Maximized Productivity
feature3.desc: Advanced prioritization and tracking tools that boost your efficiency to new levels.

feature4.title: Advanced Analytics
feature4.desc: Detailed insights into your performance. Visualize patterns, identify improvements, and celebrate your achievements.

feature5.title: Premium Security
feature5.desc: Enterprise-level data protection. Your personal information and projects are completely safe.

feature6.title: Exceptional Design
feature6.desc: Modern, minimalist interface designed to inspire creativity and keep focus on what matters.

mainpage.howDesc: In just 4 simple steps, you'll be on your way to extraordinary productivity

step1.title: Instant Registration
step1.desc: You only need your email to access all the tools that will transform your productivity.

step2.title: Smart Setup
step2.desc: Create projects, define categories, and set up the workflow that best suits your style.

step3.title: Efficient Management
step3.desc: Add tasks, set priorities and deadlines. Our system guides you step by step.

step4.title: Extraordinary Results
step4.desc: See your productivity soar as you build habits that transform your life.

mainpage.cta: Join for free and transform your productivity today.
